languages.text: Люди хватают культистов и предают огню. В свете бесчисленных костров и под вопли мерзких вероотступников колония очищается от скверны.
The people seize any cultist they expose and burn them without mercy. In the glow of countless bonfires and to the screams of vile apostates, the colony purges itself of corruption.
languages.original_text: Люди хватают культистов и предают огню. В свете бесчисленных костров и под вопли мерзких вероотступников колония очищается от скверны.

traits.locale_text: The people seize any cultist they expose and burn them without mercy. In the light of countless bonfires and with the screams of vile apostates, the colony purges itself of corruption.
Kunrad's followers bellowed their blasphemies from atop the gallows, striking fear into the hearts of their audience.
The people seize any cultist they expose and burn them without mercy. In the glow of countless bonfires and to the screams of vile apostates, the colony purges itself of corruption.
Kunrad's followers bellowed their blasphemies from atop the gallows, striking fear into the hearts of their audience.

The people seize any cultist they expose and burn them without mercy. In the glow of countless bonfires and to the screams of vile apostates, the colony purges itself of corruption.

languages.text: Les habitants se saisissent de tous les cultistes qu'ils parviennent à démasquer avant de les brûler sans autre forme de procès. À la lueur des innombrables bûchers et au son des hurlements des apostats, la colonie se purge de la corruption qui la ronge.
languages.original_text: The people seize any cultist they expose and burn them without mercy. In the glow of countless bonfires and to the screams of vile apostates, the colony purges itself of corruption.

traits.locale_text: Les habitants se saisissent de tous les cultistes qu'ils parviennent à démasquer avant de les brûler sans autre forme de procès. À la lueur des innombrables bûchers et au son des hurlements des apostats, la colonie se purge de la corruption qui la ronge.

languages.text: 民衆はあぶり出した教団信者を捕らえ、容赦なく焼き殺す。無数の焚き火の光と下劣な背教者たちの悲鳴の中、コロニーは腐敗を浄化していく。
languages.original_text: The people seize any cultist they expose and burn them without mercy. In the glow of countless bonfires and to the screams of vile apostates, the colony purges itself of corruption.

traits.locale_text: 民衆はあぶり出した教団信者を捕らえ、容赦なく焼き殺す。無数の焚き火の光と下劣な背教者たちの悲鳴の中、コロニーは腐敗を浄化していく。

languages.text: 人们揪出了那些潜伏其中的邪教徒，毫不留情地把他们活活烧死。在无数烈焰之中，在众多异端分子的惨叫声中，殖民地将腐化彻底清除。
languages.original_text: The people seize any cultist they expose and burn them without mercy. In the glow of countless bonfires and to the screams of vile apostates, the colony purges itself of corruption.

traits.locale_text: 人们揪出了那些潜伏其中的邪教徒，毫不留情地把他们活活烧死。在无数烈焰之中，在众多异端分子的惨叫声中，殖民地将腐化彻底清除。

languages.text: La gente agarra a cualquier cultista que encuentra y lo queman sin dilación. A la luz de las numerosas hogueras, acompañada por el coro de los gritos de los inmundos apóstatas, la colonia purga la corrupción.
languages.original_text: The people seize any cultist they expose and burn them without mercy. In the glow of countless bonfires and to the screams of vile apostates, the colony purges itself of corruption.

traits.locale_text: La gente agarra a cualquier cultista que encuentra y lo queman sin dilación. A la luz de las numerosas hogueras, acompañada por el coro de los gritos de los inmundos apóstatas, la colonia purga la corrupción.

languages.text: Die Leute ergreifen jeden Kultisten, den sie enttarnen, und verbrennen ihn gnadenlos. Mit dem Schein unzähliger Feuer und den Schreien schändlicher Apostaten befreit die Kolonie sich von der Verderbnis.
languages.original_text: The people seize any cultist they expose and burn them without mercy. In the glow of countless bonfires and to the screams of vile apostates, the colony purges itself of corruption.

traits.locale_text: Die Leute ergreifen jeden Kultisten, den sie enttarnen, und verbrennen ihn gnadenlos. Mit dem Schein unzähliger Feuer und den Schreien schändlicher Apostaten befreit die Kolonie sich von der Verderbnis.

languages.text: Halk, ifşa edilen her bir tarikatçıyı yakalayıp acımasızca yakıyor. Sayısız şenlik ateşinin aydınlığında ve aşağılık mürtetlerin çığlıkları eşliğinde koloni, kendini yozlaşmadan arındırıyor.
languages.original_text: The people seize any cultist they expose and burn them without mercy. In the glow of countless bonfires and to the screams of vile apostates, the colony purges itself of corruption.
